alert.note: Alert for Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 2:31PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Henry, Clay and northwestern Early Counties through 415 PM EDT/315 PM CDT/... At 331 PM EDT/231 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Abbeville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Fort Gaines, Headland, Blakely, Columbia, Kinsey, Newville, Bellville, Haleburg, Bluffton, Shorterville, Hayes, Scottsboro Crossroads, Pecan, Rock Hill, Thomas Mill Creek, Suttons Corner, Fort Gaines-Clay Airport, Balkum and Hardwickburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
